sentences.en: ...the limitations that come with economy travel.
sentences.cn: …伴随经济舱的一些限制。

sentences.en: a successful economy
sentences.cn: 发展成功的经济

sentences.en: Businessmen are tired of politicians talking the economy down.
sentences.cn: 商人厌烦政客们贬低经济的重要性.

sentences.en: By stimulating the economy, we're going to put people to work.
sentences.cn: 我们将通过刺激经济让人们实现就业。

sentences.en: He has been accused of skimming the cream off the economy.
sentences.cn: 他被控从经济中捞取了丰厚的油水。

sentences.en: In recent years the Austrian economy has outperformed most other industrial economies.
sentences.cn: 近几年，奥地利的经济发展超过了其他多数工业国。

sentences.en: International investors have become jittery about the country's economy.
sentences.cn: 国际投资者已对该国的经济状况感到紧张不安。

sentences.en: Investment could dry up and that could cause the economy to falter.
sentences.cn: 投资可能会中断，而这会引起经济衰退。

sentences.en: Investors would do well to take a look at the Swiss economy.
sentences.cn: 投资者应该关注一下瑞士的经济。

sentences.en: Lemon juice can help to prevent economy-class syndrome by improving blood circulation.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁能够改善血液循环，有助于预防经济舱综合征。

sentences.en: Not insuring your belongings is a false economy (= it is cheaper but could have bad results ).
sentences.cn: 不给个人财产投保实际上并不划算。

sentences.en: The council must make economies to meet government spending targets.
sentences.cn: 市政会必须采取节约措施以达到政府的开支指标。

sentences.en: The economy is the number one issue by far.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，经济是头等大事。

sentences.en: The economy needs an immediate 2 per cent cut in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 当前经济状况需要立即将利率下调两个百分点.

sentences.en: The gas fire was turned low for reasons of economy.
sentences.cn: 为了节省，把煤气取暖器开小了。

sentences.en: The price includes two economy class airfares from Brisbane to Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 这一价格包括两张从布里斯班到洛杉矶的经济舱机票。

sentences.en: the slowdown in the Japanese economy
sentences.cn: 日本经济的减缓

sentences.en: Their ultimate aim was a market economy for Hungary.
sentences.cn: 他们最终的目标是为匈牙利建立起市场经济体制。

sentences.en: There have been grouses about the economy, interest rates and house prices.
sentences.cn: 人们对经济、利率和房价啧有烦言。

sentences.en: Today he was able to focus his message exclusively on the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天他得以将主题全部集中在经济方面。

sentences.en: Today's report is rather more discouraging for the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天的报道让人对经济更加丧失了信心。

words.tran_cn: 经济的，经济上的；经济学的
经济地；在经济上；节俭地
经济学；国家的经济状况
节约装置；节约者；经济家

phrases.tran_cn: 多种经营；多种经济，多样化经济
范围经济，范畴经济，纵深经济
节约燃料；耗热率；燃料经济学

trans.tran_en: a product that is cheaper because you are buying a larger amount
the system by which a country’s money and goods are produced and used, or a country considered in this way
